mapper.select: select id, receipt_id, fund_account, settlement_type, this_money from capital_receipt_account where receipt_id = #{capitalReceiptId}
mapper.insert: insert into capital_receipt_account (capital_receipt_id, settlement_type, fund_account, this_money) values (#{capitalReceiptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlementType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thisMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into capital_receipt_account
capital_receipt_id,
settlement_type,
fund_account,
this_money,
#{capitalReceiptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{settlementType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fundAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{thisMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update capital_receipt_account
capital_receipt_id = #{capitalReceiptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
settlement_type = #{settlementType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fund_account = #{fundAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
this_money = #{thisMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
